packagesSection.title: The best tour packages
packagesSection.description: Discover the best travel packages with PDT Peruvian Travel. We are your ideal choice for trips as a couple, with family, or with friends. Celebrate your honeymoon, birthday, or anniversary in the most exclusive hotels and lodges in the Amazon rainforest. We guarantee unforgettable experiences and exceptional service.

ctaIquitos.title: History and Transformation
ctaIquitos.description: Located in the northeastern jungle of Peru, Iquitos is the capital of Loreto and Maynas, surrounded by the Amazon, Nanay, and Itaya rivers. Founded in 1757 by Jesuit missionaries as San Pablo de los Napeanos, the city was inhabited by the Iquitos people after the Napeanos left in the late 18th century. Between 1880 and 1914, the rubber boom drove its growth, attracting Peruvians and Europeans in search of opportunity. This boom turned Iquitos into a commercial center, modernizing the city with new architecture and public services that improved the quality of life for its residents.

cajamarcaTour.routeText: CITY – CUMBE MAYO / BAÑOS DEL INCA – GRANJA DE PORCON – CAJAMARCA
cajamarcaTour.day01Text: --:-- hrs: Meeting at the school or transport company. Prior coordination with the Educational Institution.
day02Schedule: 08:30 hrs: Cajamarca, transfer to selected hotel.
09:00 hrs: Breakfast in Cajamarca and acclimatization time. Lunch.
14:00 hrs: We begin our city tour, visiting the Cathedral San Francisco, Museums of religious art, ethnography and archaeology, Colonial Hospital, The Rescue Room and Santa Apolonia Hill.
cajamarcaTour.day03Title: Day 03: Cumbe Mayo – Rock Forest – La Collpa Hacienda – Inca Baths
day03Schedule: 09:00 hrs: Visit to Bellavista viewpoint, Layzon, Forest Park, and then the Cumbe Mayo Archaeological Center.
15:00 hrs: Visit to La Collpa hacienda, cow call, and Inca thermal baths.
cajamarcaTour.day04Title: Day 04: Porcón Farm – Otuzco – Los Alpes Ranch – Hydrangea Garden
day04Schedule: 09:00 hrs: Visit to Porcón Farm with exotic animals, trout hatchery, and forestry activities.
13:00 hrs: Visit to Otuzco necropolis, hanging bridge, and dairy tastings at Los Alpes Ranch.
day05Schedule: 09:00 hrs: Visit to Cajamarca craft market. Lunch and trip at the appropriate time.
includedItems: Pickup and arrival at the school.
04 dinners as detailed in the program.
Agency staff accompanying the group for safety.
Tour as mentioned, first aid kit.
